data.title: Landlord Tenant Law
data.meta_description: Jacqueline A. Salcines, Attorney at Law has extensive knowledge in both the landlord-tenant and real estate litigation arena
data.meta_site_name: Coral Gables Real Estate Law Offices of Jacqueline A. Salcines
data.text:
Did you know that as a tenant you are required to advise your landlord in writing as to repairs or matters that require attention or you can forfeit your rights?

Unless you exercise the law correctly and send written notices as required by Florida Statutes, you cannot protect your rights and benefit to the full extent of the law.

Whether you are a landlord that is seeking to remove your tenant for nonpayment of rent, terminate a tenancy that has expired or you are a tenant that is seeking to protect your rights in an eviction, Jacqueline A. Salcines, PA, is here to protect your rights.
